From here on out,\| you will be presented with choices that will let you gain affection points with
certain characters such as Mizuho and Sigrun.\! None will be negative (in the mayority of cases),
but only some choices offer affection points.
Even if you aren't able to accumulate enough points through dialogue choices, there will be plenty of
different opportunities for you to build affection points!\! Building your relationships with others
will cause good things to happen.\! Especially with Mizuho and Sigrun. Wink~! â‹†
Be sure to get along well with them!
